item.title: HELP PLEASE! need to know how to make myself owner of my server!
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

they have been deleted
Go client.java and search admin list
in that add this

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAMEHERE"))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

Read full topic
item.source: HELP PLEASE! need to know how to make myself owner of my server!

item.title: HELP PLEASE! need to know how to make myself owner of my server!
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

once you log in once on your server, it creates a .txt file with ur characters information in a character folder.

open up your characters .txt and look for

playerRights = 0

change the 0 to what stats you want
0 = normal player
1 = moderator
2 = administrator
3 = owner

Read full topic
item.source: HELP PLEASE! need to know how to make myself owner of my server!
